using System;
using System.Net.Http;
using System.Threading;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace TestNamespace;

[global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("Shiny.Mediator.SourceGenerators", "6.0.0")]
public partial class UpdateOrderRequestHandler(global::Shiny.Mediator.Http.HttpHandlerServices services)
    : global::Shiny.Mediator.Http.BaseHttpRequestHandler(services),
      global::Shiny.Mediator.IRequestHandler<global::TestNamespace.UpdateOrderRequest, global::TestNamespace.OrderResult>
{
    public global::System.Threading.Tasks.Task<global::TestNamespace.OrderResult> Handle(
        global::TestNamespace.UpdateOrderRequest request,
        global::Shiny.Mediator.IMediatorContext context,
        global::System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken)
    {
        var route = $"/api/orders/{request.OrderId}";

        if (request.Status != null)
        {
            route += route.Contains("?") ? "&" : "?";
            route += $"status={request.Status}";
        }

        var httpRequest = new global::System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(global::System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, route);

        if (request.CustomHeader != null)
            httpRequest.Headers.Add("X-Custom-Header", request.CustomHeader.ToString());
        if (request.Authorization != null)
            httpRequest.Headers.Add("Authorization", request.Authorization.ToString());

        if (request.Body != null)
        {
            var json = services.Serializer.Serialize(request.Body);
            httpRequest.Content = new global::System.Net.Http.StringContent(json, global::System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
        }

        return this.HandleRequest<global::TestNamespace.UpdateOrderRequest, global::TestNamespace.OrderResult>(
            httpRequest,
            request,
            context,
            cancellationToken
        );
    }
}
